Title: Best Graphics Cards (GPUs) for PC: Nvidia, AMD, Intel
Description:
Previous-Generation Cards

Normally, I’d recommend a previous generation card, but the RTX 40 Series and AMD 7000 cards are almost entirely out of stock or massively marked up at major retailers. There are still a few older-generation cards you can pick up relatively easily, and they’re some of the only options under $500, with newer generations only having the more expensive cards live. These cards are squarely targeting 1,920 x 1,080 for gaming, so don’t get your hopes up if you have a higher resolution or refresh rate.

AMD

Before the 50 Series launch, I was using a Sapphire Pulse 7900 XT, a card I would love to recommend now, as it served me well for two years at 3,440 x 1,440 and was under $700 in June 2023. Unfortunately, it’s currently hard to find in stock, and restocks will slow down considerably now that the new AMD cards are on the market.

Instead, I'd reach a little further down the power scale and grab an RX 7600. While I haven't spent time with this model, I’ve been historically pleased with Sapphire’s cards, and it should be fairly capable at 1080p in older titles, indie games, and great for your average evening of Rocket League or Minecraft.

Again, this card isn’t going to push 1440p, especially in newer games, and it’s going to lack some of the features you’re seeing on the latest and greatest GPUs. It should get you down the road until things have hopefully calmed down a bit, though.

Nvidia

As of early April 2025, the only previous-generation card I can consistently find in stock from Nvidia is the RTX 4060, a GPU which is also approaching two years on the market. It was a capable card at 1080p, but it doesn't keep up quite as well with today’s games, and you'll have to turn the settings down to even consider 1440p.

Of the available picks, I like the MSI GeForce RTX 4060 Ventus 2X Black, a compact card with a low power requirement that should fit into basically any modern system. MSI has a great track record for reliable, straightforward graphics cards, and this one is in stock and recently discounted.

Of the two, I think the AMD is a better buy, even though it’s performance is slightly less impressive on paper than the RTX 4060. At the sub-$500 price point, a $100 price difference can be massive, so keep an eye out for discounts to make sure you’re getting the best deal, especially as these generations begin to close out.

Buying Used

When it comes to GPUs, I'm generally a fan of buying new. Not only will you ensure you have proper warranty and RMA support if something goes wrong, but it can be hard to know if someone misused the GPU, either through heavy crypto mining, poor temperature control in their system, or artifacts and issues they didn't disclose. I'm often a fan of buying used in other areas, but with demand and prices so high, it can be hard to trust strangers.

If you do buy used, make sure to do your legwork. Local meetups via Craigslist or Reddit can have great deals and give you a chance to inspect the GPU, even if you can't make sure it boots up. You can also ask for video proof of the card running a game that also includes the serial number in one continuous shot. If you’re considering buying a used card online, make sure you’re aware of the marketplace and payment processors' return and dispute policies.

When you get the card home, inspect it immediately for any damage to the card, particularly on the PCIe fin and the power connectors. Once installed, a software tool called GPU-Z can verify the card’s hardware to make sure it matches the expected numbers for the model. Run some games on it right away, so that if anything is wrong you can reach out to the seller right away.

Title: The 20 Settings You Need to Change on Your iPhone
Description:
Apple’s software design strives to be intuitive, but each iteration of iOS contains so many additions and tweaks that it's easy to miss some useful iPhone settings. Apple focused on artificial intelligence when it unveiled iOS 18 in 2024, but there's a lot under the hood that adds to the steady stream of intriguing customizations and lesser-known features from the last few years. Several helpful settings are turned off by default, and it's not immediately obvious how to switch off some annoying features. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Apple phone.

Once you have things set up the way you want, it’s a breeze to copy everything, including settings, when you switch to a new iPhone. For more tips and recommendations, read our related guides—Best iPhone, Best iPhone 16 Cases, Best MagSafe Accessories—and our explainers on How to Set Up a New iPhone, How to Back Up Your iPhone, and How to Fix Your iPhone.

Power up with unlimited access to WIRED. Get best-in-class reporting that's too important to ignore for just $2.50 $1 per month for 1 year. Includes unlimited digital access and exclusive subscriber-only content. Subscribe Today.

How to Keep Your iPhone Updated These settings are based on the latest version of iOS 18, and should be applicable for most recent iPhones. Some settings may not be available on older devices or they may have different pathways depending on the model and the software version. Apple offers excellent software support for many years, so always make sure your device is up-to-date by heading to Settings > General > Software update. You can find the Settings app on your home screen.

Customize the Control Center

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

Swipe down from the top right of the screen to open the Control Center, and you’ll see it's more customizable than ever. You can tap the plus icon at the top left or tap and hold on an empty space to open the customization menu. Here you can move icons and widgets around, remove anything you don’t want, or tap Add a Control at the bottom for a searchable list of shortcut icons and widgets you can organize across multiple Control Center screens. You can also customize your home screen with iOS 18 to change the color and size of app icons, rearrange them, and more.

Change Your Lock Screen Buttons





1 / 5 Chevron Chevron Screenshot courtesy of Parker Hall Screenshot

You know those lock screen controls that default to flashlight on the bottom left and camera on the bottom right? You can change them. Press and hold on an empty space on the lock screen and tap Customize, then Lock Screen. Tap the minus icon to remove an existing shortcut, and tap the plus icon to add a new one. You can also change the weather and date widgets, the font and color for the time, and pick a wallpaper.

Extend Screen Time-Out

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

While it’s good to have your screen time out for battery saving and security purposes, I find it maddening when the screen goes off while I’m doing something. The default screen time-out is too short in my opinion, but thankfully, you can adjust it. Head into Settings, Display & Brightness, and select Auto-Lock to extend it. You have several options, including Never, which means you will have to manually push the power button to turn the screen off.

Turn Off Keyboard Sounds

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

The iPhone’s keyboard clicking sound when you type is extremely aggravating. Trust me, even if you don’t hate it, everyone in your vicinity when you type sure does. You can turn it off in Settings, Sound & Haptics by tapping Keyboard Feedback and toggling Sound off. I also advise toggling off the Lock Sound while you’re in Sound & Haptics.

Go Dark

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

Protect yourself from eye-searing glare with dark mode. Go to Settings, pick Display & Brightness, and tap Dark. You may prefer to toggle on Automatic and have it change with the sun setting, but I prefer to be in Dark mode all the time.

Change Your Battery Charge Level

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

If you’re determined to squeeze as many years out of your iPhone battery as possible, consider changing the charging limit. You can maximize your smartphone's battery health if you avoid charging it beyond 80 percent. The iPhone’s default is now Optimized Battery Charging, which waits at 80 percent and then aims to hit 100 percent when you are ready to go in the morning. But there’s a slider you can set to a hard 80 percent limit in Settings, under Battery, and Charging.

Set Up the Action Button





1 / 4 Chevron Chevron Screenshot courtesy of Simon Hill 20-Setting_Action Button 1_Photo SOURCE Simon Hill Screenshot

Folks with an iPhone 15 Pro model or any device in the iPhone 16 range have an Action Button instead of the old mute switch. By default, it will silence your iPhone when you press and hold it, but you can change what it does by going to Settings, then Action Button. You can swipe through various basic options from Camera and Flashlight to Visual Intelligence, but select Shortcuts if you want it to do something more interesting. If you’re unfamiliar, check out our guide on How to Use the Apple Shortcuts App.

Turn Off Apple Intelligence

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

Much vaunted but slightly underwhelming, Apple Intelligence isn’t fully baked yet, and we are still waiting for an improved Siri. If you prefer to opt out of certain features or opt out completely, go to Settings, Apple Intelligence & Siri, and tap on it to toggle Apple Intelligence off. If you prefer to keep select features on, you can find instructions in our How to Turn off Apple Intelligence guide.

Hide Sensitive Apps

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

Whether you are embarrassed by your Candy Crush addiction or risque photos, or perhaps you’ve been using the Notes app to plan your partner’s birthday party, you can hide them from prying eyes. I'm not here to judge. To protect an app, you have two options: tap and hold on the icon and select Require Face ID, then Require Face ID or Hide and Require Face ID. The first option leaves the app in place, but no one can access it without a Face ID check. If you prefer to hide the app, choose the second option and then Hide App, and it will be obscured inside a Hidden folder at the bottom of your App Library that requires a Face ID check to open.

Stop Videos Autoplaying or Looping

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

If you find it irritating that videos automatically play as you scroll through the Photos app, or it bugs you that they loop and repeat instead of stopping at the end, you can change that behavior. Tap Settings, Apps, then Photos, and scroll down to toggle Auto-Play Motion and Loop Videos off.

Enhance Speech in Movies and TV Shows

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

It can be tough to make out the dialog in some TV shows and movies, but Apple has a fix for muffled speech on your iPhone. When you’re playing a video, tap the screen to bring up the menu and select the audio icon. You can select Enhance Dialogue and choose Enhance or Enhance More to make the voices louder and clearer.

Set Up Do Not Disturb





1 / 4 Chevron Chevron Screenshot courtesy of Simon Hill Screenshot

At an absolute minimum, you should shut up your iPhone at night so it doesn’t disturb your sleep, but Apple offers a wide range of tools to automate or schedule downtime to help you focus. Go to Settings, Focus, and choose Do Not Disturb to get started. You can turn off notifications but set up exceptions so that specific contacts or apps will get through. You can also go to Screen Time and Downtime to set a specific schedule for each day.

Change Your Default Apps





1 / 4 Chevron Chevron Screenshot courtesy of Simon Hill Screenshot

You don’t have to use Safari as your browser or Apple’s Mail app for emails. You can change the default apps on your iPhone by going to Settings, Apps, and Default Apps. If you have valid alternative apps installed for Email, Messaging, Browser, and a few other categories, you can select them instead of Apple’s apps.

Keep iCloud Files Local

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

You can choose to keep certain files that you have synced with iCloud stored locally on your iPhone, which is handy if you want to access them when there’s no internet available. Open the Files app, go to the Browse tab, and choose iCloud Drive. You can tap and hold on any folder or file and select Keep Downloaded to keep a copy on your iPhone.

Limit App Permissions

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

It’s worth reviewing your app permissions and limiting them. There are a few routes to do this, but Settings, then Privacy & Security, might be the easiest. There’s a lot here, but I advise looking at Location Services and removing or reducing permissions for apps you don’t think need them. You can toggle off Precise Location for many, since an approximate location is often enough for them to function the way you want. Other apps to keep an eye on are Contacts and Photos, as both now give you the option to allow limited access.

By the way, if you want to turn off Background App Refresh to stop apps sucking down data and draining the battery when you aren’t using them, go to Settings, Apps, and choose any you don’t need to refresh unless you open them to toggle it off.

Change Siri’s Voice

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

Apple offers a whole range of voices for Siri now. Go to Settings, choose Apple Intelligence & Siri, and tap Voice to see a list of variations (American, Australian, British, Indian, Irish, South African) and voices (Irish Voice 2 is my pick). Just be aware that if you choose a new one, it may take a while to download.

Set a Shortcut for Your Email Address





1 / 5 Chevron Chevron Screenshot courtesy of Simon Hill Screenshot

Forget about typing out your whole email address every time. Go to Settings, General, and choose Keyboard. Tap Text Replacement and then the plus icon at the top right to set up text shortcuts, such as “eml” for your full email address, or “addy” for your mailing address. This can also work for any other text you type out frequently.

Show Notifications on Lock Screen

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

Apple is all about privacy, but having to unlock your iPhone to see the content of an incoming message can be annoying. You can change how this works by going to Settings, Notifications, and selecting Show Previews. It is set to When Unlocked by default, but you can choose Always or Never.

Make Some AI Art

Screenshots courtesy of Simon Hill

If you decide to give AI a chance and fancy generating some art with AI assistance, open up the Playground app. You can pick photos, themes, costumes, accessories, places, or type prompts. Here’s a full guide on how to use Apple’s Image Playground. It's available on Apple devices running iOS 18.2, iPadOS 18.2, or macOS Sequoia 15.2.

Reduce Car Sickness





1 / 4 Chevron Chevron Screenshot courtesy of Simon Hill Screenshot

Do you get nauseous when you use your iPhone as a car passenger? Go to Settings, Accessibility, choose Motion, then Show Vehicle Motion Cues. You can turn it on or off to display dots that help reduce motion sickness, but if you tap Automatic, it will turn on when it detects you are in the car.

Title: Yuval Noah Harari: ‘How Do We Share the Planet With This New Superintelligence?’
Description:
Israeli historian and philosopher Yuval Noah Harari’s book Sapiens became an international bestseller by presenting a view of history driven by the fictions created by mankind. His later work Homo Deus then depicted the a future for mankind brought about by the emergence of superintelligence. His latest book, Nexus: A Brief History of Information Networks From the Stone Age to AI, is a warning against the unparalleled threat of AI.

A rising trend of techno-fascism driven by populism and artificial intelligence has been visible since the US presidential election in November. Nexus, which was published just a few months earlier, is a timely explainer of the potential consequences of AI on democracy and totalitarianism. In the book, Harari does not just sound the alarm on singularity—the hypothetical future point at which technology, particularly AI, moves beyond human control and advances irreversibly on its own—but also on AI’s foreignness.

This interview was conducted by Michiaki Matsushima, editor in chief of WIRED Japan, and was also recorded for “The Big Interview” YouTube series for the Japanese edition of WIRED, scheduled to be released in April 2025. The interview has been edited for clarity and length.

Photograph: Shintaro Yoshimatsu

WIRED: In the late ’90s, when the internet began to spread, there was a discourse that this would bring about world peace. It was thought that with more information reaching more people, everyone would know the truth, mutual understanding would be born, and humanity would become wiser. WIRED, which has been a voice of change and hope in the digital age, was part of that thinking at the time. In your new book, Nexus, you write that such a view of information is too naive. Can you explain this?

YUVAL NOAH HARARI: Information is not the same as truth. Most information is not an accurate representation of reality. The main role information plays is to connect many things, to connect people. Sometimes people are connected by truth, but often it is easier to use fiction or illusion.

The same is true of the natural world. Most of the information that exists in nature is not meant to tell the truth. We are told that the basic information underlying life is DNA, but is DNA true? No. DNA connects many cells together to make a body, but it does not tell us the truth about anything. Similarly, the Bible, one of the most important texts in human history, has connected millions of people together, but not necessarily by telling them the truth.

When information is in a complete free market, the vast majority of information becomes fiction, illusion, or lies. This is because there are three main difficulties with truth.

First of all, telling the truth is costly. On the other hand, creating fiction is inexpensive. If you want to write a truthful account of history, economics, physics, et cetera, you need to invest time, effort, and money in gathering evidence and fact-checking. With fiction, however, you can simply write whatever you want.

Title: Can Donald Trump really get around the ban on the third term?
Description:
Is a third term for Donald Trump really possible or not? There has been no mention of anything else since the President of the United States, over the weekend, issued some statements in an interview with the NBC where he specified that "there would be a way" to get around the 22nd amendment of the Constitution, ratified in 1951, which reads: "Nobody can be elected president more than twice". But is it really possible to avoid this stake as the tenant of the White House says?

Donald Trump, third mandate? The hypotheses on the table

A lot is discussing and the hypotheses, according to the experts in the sector, could be substantially three. The first sees the race for the presidency of J.D. Vance, with Trump as his deputy. In case of victory the first one should then discharge and the tycoon would take its place, thus becoming president by circumventing the word "elected". It would therefore become the number one to the White House passing from the office of deputy. Here, however, the obstacle is represented by another amendment, the twelfth, which specifies that those who cannot be president cannot even be deputy. The other hypothesis on the table provides that Vance is candidate together with another vice -president. On elections won, the deputy should resign and at that point Vance could appoint Trump to his place, with the Senate's ok. Here the possible unfavorable interpretations of the twelfth amendment would also be wandered.

The most difficult way would instead be that of the constitutional reform: "It is not easy but not impossible - explains Marco Sioli, associate professor of American history and politics at the Milan state road and author of the book" American Golem " - should find the votes of two thirds of the Chambers and the assent of the 3/4 of the States. Trump, however, does not have enough votes at the Congress and in state parliaments, especially of some states. Just think of those of the New England, especially for its policies, especially for its policies. Anti-Canadians, with the signs of the protests that have gone around the world and who recited 'nobody voted for Elon Musk' or those in Vermont, where at the passage of the vice president Vancer Vancer there were those who said 'go to ski in Russia' ". It should be noted that Vermont is the state of the socialist senator Bernie Sanders, a bitter opponent of Trump.

Just a shot or a communication strategy?

And if there are those who have really taken it seriously, appealing the Gotha of American law to understand how the prohibition of the third term could circumvent, there are also those who consider it a weapon of mass distraction from the embarrassing in the safety, after the case of the editor -in -chief of The Atlantic, Jeffrey Goldberg, inserted without his knowledge in a chat (moreover in one of the most anti -existing social networks, Signal) where Information was exchanged that defining delicate would be an understatement, such as messages on the attacks in Yemen before they took place (the administration had instead said that it was not classified information): "He plays a lot to shift attention, pull the stone in the tin and then withdraw the hand - adds Sioli - carries on an extreme arrogant narrative, typical of businessmen, used to impose their own rules. Here the exaltation of the rich and the idea of ​​oligarchy, which passes through even the most unthinkable ideas. One above all, the proposal of a republican deputy of Florida, Anna Paulina Luna, who asks for Trump's face on Mount Rushmore, alongside those of George Washington, Thomas Jefferson, Theodore Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln is also sculpted.

A weapon of mass distraction that could be the symptom of fear of not being able to maintain the same consent in the Midterm elections: "Perhaps it will no longer be enough to unite the darkest features of populism and the very idea of ​​being on the side of reason thanks also to religion - concludes the professor of the state road - protests for cuts to social security are felt, inflation has grown and a large slice of the American population works to Bollette.

Title: Neurodegenerative diseases, the algorithm that flashes toxic proteins arrives
Description:
He manages to find the harmful proteins for the brain that lead to the development of neurodegenerative diseases. This is the capacity of the Catgranule 2.0 Robot, a new Machine Learning algorithm just developed as part of the European IVBM-4PAP project, coordinated by the Italian Institute of Technology (IIT). Described in a study published in the Genome Biology magazine, the new algorithm studies the behavior of proteins inside the cells, managing to predict those that have the potential to unleash neurodegenerative diseases, such as amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (SLA), Parkinson and Alzheimer's. This is why it represents a precious tool to help us identify molecular targets for targeted therapies.

Neurodegenerative diseases

Only in Italy there are about one million people with neurodegenerative diseases, pathologies characterized by protein structures similar to balls (biomolecular condensed), such as the Parkinson's Lewy bodies, the accumulations of filaments in the ALS motorbike and the alzheimer's amyloid plaques. We know, in fact, that the ability of proteins to form balls, in conditions of good health, contributes to managing the production of other proteins and responding to situations of cell stress. But when this mechanism undergoes an alteration, this leads to the development of the disease, where protein balls are transformed into solid structures that accumulate (aggregates of solid matter) into the cells and lead them to death.

The algorithm

The new 2.0 robot Catgranule algorithm (acronym for rebonucleoprotein organization in Biocondensatestetes Types) is able to understand the link between the mutations present in the proteins and the formation of condensed, managing to trace potentially harmful proteins. "The identification of biochemical characteristics related to neurodegenerative diseases is crucial to intervene early and slowing down cognitive decay," explained Gian Gaetano Tartaglia, who coordinated the study. "We trained our system to recognize the formation of condensate, which in many cases is an initial step for the formation of toxic aggregates. A fundamental contribution to this event comes from the protein -na interaction".

RNA-Protein interaction

Since the formation of the balls is also regulated by the EN, which interacts with proteins facilitating or inhibiting the chemical-physical mechanism which, in fact, leads to the formation of biomolecular condensed (separation of the liquid-liquid phase) the researchers have focused on the so-called RNA-Protein interaction, instructing the new algorithm so that you use this parameter as an indicator to determine if Biomolecular condensed has the potential to become toxic. While the algorithm analyzes the structure of a protein, considering its affinity for the RNA, the researchers can determine the propensity to suffer the phase separation and to create condensed. The robot method, explain the researchers, therefore allows you to study the influence of mutations on liquid-liquid separation: if they alter the protein -na interaction, it is likely that they also condition the formation of condensed, leading to pathological consequences.

New strategies

The Catgranule 2.0 Robot algorithm is part of the IVBM-4PAP international project, which aims to develop the microscope called In-Vivo Brillouin Microscope (IVBM), a tool that will serve to measure the properties of proteins and condensate within living cells, without external interventions. The integration between the computational work of the algorithm and the experimental activities of the microscope has the potential to identify early pathological signals and develop new therapeutic strategies that slow down the progression of neurodegenerative diseases, thus reducing their long -term impacts.

Title: Grok, Elon Musk has "stolen" the name of his chatbot?
Description:
The artificial intelligence company of Elon Musk, Xai, risks being involved in a dispute linked to the name of its chatbot, Grok. The United States brands and patents office (USPTO) has in fact suspended the application for registration of the trademark presented by the company, claiming that the name of the system could be confused with that of two other companies, the chip manufacturer to the Grq and the Grokstream software provider. And to make matters worse, now a third technological startup, Bizly, claims to be the owner of the rights associated with the term "Grok".

It is not the first time that Musk chooses for its products a name that other companies claim to have already recorded. Last month, the entrepreneur's social media platform resolved with an agreement a cause intended by a marketing company that claimed to have the exclusive rights on the name X.

The dispute around the name of Grok

Bizly and Xai seem to have come to the name Grok independently. Ron Shah, founder of the company, says he had the idea during a brainstorming session with a colleague, who had the habit of using the word as a verb (in the technological environments "to Grok" is often used as a synonym to "understand"). "I thought: 'It's just the right name' - Shah says to Wired US -. We got excited and we gave ourselves the five: it was the right name!".

For his part, Musk said that the inspiration for the name of his chatbot came from the 1961 science fiction novel in foreign land, by Robert A. Heinlein, as reported by the Times of India. In the book Grok was a word of a Martian language, always translatable as "understanding".

Shah claims to have submitted the application to record the commercial name in 2021. Two years later, when he was on the verge of launching an app for asynchronous meetings renamed Grok, Musk announced an homonymous chatbot. "It was a day that I will never forget - comments Shah -. I woke up and looked at my phone; there were a lot of messages from friends who said 'you were acquired by Elon? Congratulations!'. For me it was an absolute shock".

Things say the American rules

Shah is convinced that Xai has violated his commercial brand. In the United States, however, the laws on the subject are first designed to protect consumers rather than companies, says Josh Gerben, founder of Gerben IP, a law firm that deals exclusively with brands. "The goal is not to create confusion about those who hide a product or service," he explains.

Title: Free absorbents in superiors in Valle d'Aosta, it is the first region in Italy to provide them for free
Description:
The Aosta Valley has made the high schools of its territory of free absorbent distributors for students install in all ten high schools. The plan, communicated by the regional councilor for the Jean-Pirre Guichardaz educational system, is now to extend the service of the tampons boxes also to middle schools.

"Too often menstruation are still considered a taboo thus uncomfortable the girls - explained the commissioner - and this must not happen. School is a space where nobody must feel out of place. The next step will be to extend the psychological desk to all superiors".

This is the first region in Italy to introduce this service in a widespread way, in the wake of numerous European schools, as in the cases of Scotland, France and Denmark.

The request of the students

Already since 2022, the students of the Valley high schools have started to request distributors through their representative organ, the student council. At first they had organized themselves independently to set up some of them inside schools and leave absorbent for other companions for free. From now on, the tampons box will be available in the female baths of all high schools in the region.

The distributors were advertised with the slogan "The cycle is not a choice", to raise awareness of all the boys on the theme and decrease taboos and difficulties related to menstruation.

Other initiatives in Italy

Also in Milan, at the Parini high school, free absorbent distributors have been available for years installed by the students of the Rebelde collective with the favor of the presidency and school representatives. Five hundred monthly absorbents, obtained thanks to a collaboration with the Coop supermarket chain which has decided to support the initiative.

Title: Tesla burned, "It's not simple vandalism", says the Northern Senator Claudio Borghi
Description:
The first to thunder against the malicious fire that destroyed the vehicles parked outside the offices of the capital's dealer was precisely the leader of the party of Borghi and Ultrà supporter of Elon Musk, the vice premier Matteo Salvini. The Minister of Transport, during the umpteenth black day for the railways, with numerous cancellations and monstrous delays accumulated by the trains for a breakdown on the Rome - Naples line, did not want to miss his support for the American friend. "Too much hatred unjustified against the Tesla car manufacturer," he wrote on X, and then adds: "The season of hatred and conflict must end as soon as possible. My solidarity goes to Elon Musk and to all the workers who have been threatened and attacked".

Elon Musk's descent in the field is damaging Tesla

An action, that conducted in Rome against the electric cars produced by the American magnate, which could remember (with due proportions) the boycott actions that were organized against supermarkets owned by the deceased former premier Silvio Berlusconi at the time of his descent on the field: "They are actions that always come from the left", comments Claudio Borghi who raises the dose: "Every time there is someone who does not like, damage, smear, criminal actions and things of this type.

Donald Trump will pursue attacks on Tesla dealerships as acts of terrorism, the President of the United States officially takes the defenses of Elon Musk against vandalism

Obviously starting from the assumption that boycott a company is an absolutely lawful action, while setting fire to cars is a crime, it is a fact that the descent into the field of Elon Musk and its support for the far right of the whole planet has attracted the attacks of organized groups on Tesla both in Europe and in the United States, where the general prosecutor Pam Bondi launched a very hard warning on TV against the numerous damage that occurred US dealerships, which will be pursued by the USA administration as "Terrorism Acts", as announced by Donald Trump: "Whoever will take part in this wave of internal terrorism - he said - will be taken and arrested". And again: "These episodes are a serious threat to national security for which we will not discounts. You can escape, but do not hide. Justice is coming".

The drop in the stock exchange and in the sales of Tesla is not only the fault of the descent in Musk's politics The entrepreneur's exits and the friendship with Trump do not explain everything

Criminal actions aside, the reaction of public opinion to the political positioning of Elon Musk, the advance of the Chinese brands and the flop of the cybertruck, are damaging Tesla producing a conspicuous collapse of sales and actions: in the last two months the title has lost 40% of its value and does not mention "rebounds". We are talking about vehicles that turn to a medium-high-end audience and this hiring, combined with the aversion of the right against electric cars, misalign (and much) the brand's reference target from the political positions of its owner. In essence, with the exception of the Fratoianni family, at the center of a surreal controversy for the purchase of a Tesla by Elisabetta Piccotti, wife and colleague of the leader of the Italian left, the progressive voter who aims at "zero emissions" chooses to buy cars that do not finance what is in all respects an ultra -right leader today, while the average voter of the right parties does not use electric cars, which never so expensive. In short, net of increasingly widespread vandalism, Tesla is now unveiled quite transversally: a beautiful problem for Donald Trump's right arm.

Title: The blue screen of Microsoft's death will be even more disturbing
Description:
The blue death screen - Blue Screen of Death - by Microsoft is undoubtedly one of the worst nightmares of its users. Yet in the near future it will only become a distant memory, or almost. According to what was announced by the company, in fact, the design of the screen will be completely revolutionized by the next Windows 11 update. Among the most striking news, in fact, there is the choice to abandon the traditional blue color, the icon of the caught face - which has accompanied the error signaling message to users since 2012 - and the QR code, so as to make the design of the screen clearer and more direct, just like that of the Windows screen in the update.

And this means only one: soon the blue screen of Microsoft's death will no longer be blue, but black. It is direct, given that it will present a very direct message that reads: "Your device has encountered a problem and must be restarted". "We are previewing a new slimmer user interface for unexpected restarts, which is better aligned with the design principles of Windows 11 and supports our goal of bringing users back to productivity as quickly as possible - writes the company in a post published on its official blog -. We have simplified the user's experience by preserving the technical information on the screen". In short, Microsoft has been done to improve the experience of users as much as possible, even when it comes to the notification of a system error.

In any case, at present only Windows insiders can preview the new screen in the trial versions of the Beta, Dev and Canary channels. For the moment, however, what they will see is a green screen, waiting for the company to decide to definitively replace the old and beloved blue. The idea, however, is to make the new design of the screen available for everyone as soon as possible. But how will users take it?

Title: The film dedicated to Willy The Coyote will finally be released at the cinema
Description:
Fans of poor Willie The Coyote can pull a breath of relief: the film Coyote vs. Acme that sees him absolute protagonist, has been saved from the forgotten and finally will be released in the cinema (at least, for now, in the United States). The story of this mixed film, a little live-action and a little animated, was in fact rather troubled: the film was spoken since 2018 and was finally made, after several changes of directors and screenwriters, with an exit scheduled in theaters for July 2023; In that same year, however, Warner Bros. decided before moving it and then to definitively remove it from his own relese Schedule, to take advantage of a taxation that made the film already made more convenient that it is not actually released in theaters.

The move, highly criticized by the talent involved in the film but also by the public opinion and the experts, was finally overturned. Warner Bros., in fact, has decided to leave the projectors of the project to look for a new home, who found in the Ketchup Entertainment company. Under this new aegis, therefore, Coyote vs. ACME will be released on the American market during 2026, and it is likely that at that point it will also be spread in the rest of the world. "We are electrified of having reached an agreement with Warner Bros. Pictures to bring this film to the public all over the world. Coyote Vs. ACME is the perfect mix of nostalgia and modern speaking, capturing the essence of the beloved characters of the Looney Tunes and presenting them to a new generation", assured Gareth West, Kettertinment CEO.

Directed by David Green on a script by Samy Burch (May December), the film takes inspiration from an article in the New Yorker written in 1990 by Ian Frazier, in which it is imagined that poor Willie, exhausted by his continuous failures in the desperate attempt to capture Beep Beep, decides to sue the Acme, the company that provides him with all the gadgets and the arms that invariably they return against him. In the cast of the film we find John Cena, in the role of the lawyer who defends Acme, and Will Forte, in those of the lawyer who represents Willie the Coyote. The historian voice actor of the Looney Tunes Eric Bauza appears in the original version by providing the voice to several characters among the confirmed there are certainly Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Porky Pig, the cat Silvestro, Titti, the grandmother and many others. A few years after Space Jam: New Legends of 2021, here we will finally be able to see new adventures of the Looney Tunes, fortunately escaping the logic of contemporary cinematography.

Title: Tuttocittà refers the look and welcomes new functions
Description:
Tuttocittà has been for years what are now the various services such as Google Maps and Apple Maps, or an often essential point of reference when a specific address had to be found in a city that is not so known. Or, a specific commercial activity, with maps divided by pages and easily accessible to not get lost. Today, Italyonline who owns Tuttocittà, announces the availability of the online portal with a restyling concerning the graphic interface and with many new features.

At the center of the renewal of Tuttocittà is the new foundation that is based on the free data of Opensreetmap to create a dynamic map and enriched with numerous research variables that can be set online. Opening the official website, the same graphic impact of all services based on the map of Opensreetmap is found, with the maps that focus on the Italian territory (including islands), being able to choose the standard level (layer) or the view with satellite photos at the bottom left. Immediately above there is the button that informs real time on traffic, which can always be a discriminant on the choice of one path rather than another. You can set the location or activity at the top left and there are various rapid buttons on the filters of categories such as hotels, restaurants, taxis, parking lots, pharmacies, hospitals, ATMs, posts, petrol stations and supermarkets.

On the left, here are the commands to move on to the calculation of the route, selection of activities, traffic and research for Cap and you can immediately notice the large advertising banner in the retractable window. Regarding commercial activities, there is the button to open the card on yellow pages with contacts, website, photos and any reviews to read. Tuttocittà can be used for free and does not require to credit with a recorded user.

Title: Maturity 2025, all the news on admission, performance and vote
Description:
The dates of the Maturity 2025 approach: it starts on June 18 at 8.30 with the first written test. The Minister of Education and merit, Giuseppe Valditara, has signed a ministerial order to define the methods of carrying out the new state exam for the school year 2024-2025.

The main news for the 2025 high school exam

To access the maturity exam for the current school year, it will be necessary to carry out paths for transversal skills and for orientation (PCTO) and/or similar activities. As regards external candidates, however, the Ministry of Education announces that "the activities similar to PCTOs are ascertained and evaluated by the Council of the class of the educational, state or equal institution".

According to the provisions introduced by law 150/2024 regarding the assessment of the behavior of secondary school students, if in the final ballot phase the candidates obtain an evaluation of less than six tenths in conduct, they cannot be admitted to the state exam. Instead, in the event that the evaluation will be equal to six tenths, during the interview the student will have to discuss a critical elaborate on "active and supportive citizenship based on respect for the constitutional principles".

The evaluation of the conduct will then also affect the credits for admission to the high school exam: the highest score can only be assigned to students who will have obtained a vote of behavior equal to or greater than nine tenths

As regards the topic of the final elaborate, it will be defined by the class council during the final ballot, while the assignment of the paper and any other useful indications relating to times and methods of delivery will be communicated to the individual candidates within the day following the ballot.

The goal of these news, Minister Valditara said, is to guarantee "a school that rewards merit and prepares students to face the future with awareness and competence. Valuing the behavior of our children is functional to restore the principle of individual responsibility, a crucial element in the formation of tomorrow's citizens".

Title: Highway Code, too many licensed and suspended licenses, but the accidents drop slightly. And the prefectures cannot manage the load
Description:
We are still not there. With the new highway code, record increase in retreat of the driving license (even grew by 73%): however, they do not quickly drop road accidents. Or, at least, not in all cities of Italy. Three months after the controversial reform, strongly desired by the Minister of Transport Matteo Salvini and entered into force on December 14, 2024, this is the first budget on the basis of the data of the traffic police, analyzed by the Sole 24 Ore.

Withdrawal and suspension, the numbers

The interventions of the police have definitely grown, from North to Southern Italy: between mid -December 2024 and mid -March 2025, the licenses withdrawn by suspension or revocation were 16,432, against 10,620 of the same period of the previous year. An increase that must be attributed mainly to two sizes introduced with the reform of the highway code: the strictest penalties for those who use the mobile phone behind the wheel and the so -called short suspension, penalties that suspend the license from 7 to 15 days for some infringements, depending on the number of points that the driver has on the document.

Not in all the cities of Italy, however, the result is the same: at the top of the group of those who have tightened checks and penalties there are Milan, with 647 retreats against only 183 of the previous year (+253.6 percent at two and a half months from the reform), followed by Bari, with 103 retreats against 34 of the previous year (+202.9 percent) and Palermo, with 267 retreats against the previous year (+214.1 for hundred). Then Turin, with 546 retreats against 160 of the previous year (+241.3 percent), Rome, where from 1 January to 20 March 2025 530 licenses were withdrawn against the 300 of the previous year (+76.7 percent). Again, Florence from 124 to 174 (+40%), Genoa, from the 366 acts sent to the Prefecture between 1 January and 26 March 2024 to 746 of the period 1 January - 26 March 2025.

The reason for the Salvini reform

The Salvini reform of the Highway Code was born from the alarm for road mortality in Italy: in 2023 there were over 3,000 victims of road accidents, positioning Italy at the bottom of the ranking of the European Union countries. A primacy that imposed an intervention.

Licenses with withdrawn and suspended but the accidents drop slightly

But what efficacy have the penalties have, which are also putting the municipal offices of the whole of Italy to the test with a not indifferent administrative load, on road accidents? For now they have decreased, but not decisively. Not only that: the data are not homogeneous in the cities of Italy and, above all, seem to be in line with the overall trend underway in recent years.

According to the data published by the Sole 24 Ore, in these first three months of 2025 there were 11,568 accidents, with a drop of 5.1 percent compared to the same period of the previous year, while compared to the same period of 2023 the accidents decreased by 1.6 percent. The cities with the most visible results are Naples (-25.5 percent), Florence (-20.7 percent), Bologna (-13.8 percent) where, however, the "City 30" project must also be considered, wanted by the center-left junta, which introduced the limit of 30 kilometers per hour in the major roads. A project, however, strongly opposed by Salvini himself. Rome follows (-6.4 percent).

Title: Dr House lands with all seasons on Netflix, here are the things (maybe) you don't know about the series
Description: Dr House is one of the most beautiful series ever written but lasted too much due to the avidity of the network. After the fourth season, the quality of the show has dizzyingly dropped to the terrible eighth final vintage. Title: The intermittent fasting could be a solution to the drop in sexual desire
Description:
In addition to weight loss, intermittent fasting has a wide range of effects on our body. Among these, now, there could also be the increase in sexual desire. This was reported by researchers from the German center for neuro-degenerative Dzne diseases who, together with a team from the Qingdao University and the University of Health and Rehabilitation Sciences, have shown, so far only in mice, as fasting lower the concentration of serotonin in the brain, consequently increasing libido. A mechanism that hypothesize researchers in their study published on Cell Metabolism, could be similar in human beings and therefore represent a potential approach to treat the unwanted drop in libido.

Intermittent fasting

The initial purpose of the researchers was to understand the effects of intermittent fasting on aging. "Using mice as a model, we study the underlying biological mechanisms," explained Dan Ehninger, among the authors of the study. "Our goal is to obtain information that could also be relevant for humans." In particular, the study involved a group of male mice, starting from 2 months of age, subjected to a specific intermittent fasting model: they were allowed to feed for 24 hours, then followed by another 24 hours in which they had access only to the water. Only at the end of the fasting regime, for a group that lasted 22 months, for another 6 months and for another even a few weeks, male mice came into contact with females.

The increase in libido

From the subsequent experiments, the team observed that the older male mice had a particularly large number of offspring. "It's a matter of behavior," said the expert. "In other words, these animals had an unusually high frequency of coupling and, consequently, an unusually high number of offspring for their age. Their mating behavior compensated more than widely the physiological limitations related to age." The greatest sexual activity was also observed in younger male mice, which had followed fasting for 6 months, but was completely absent in other groups of mice, both young and old, who had followed him for a few weeks. "In order for intermittent fasting to increase Libido, it takes some time," explained the co-author Yu Zhou. "Based on our experiments, the minimum duration seems to be between 6 weeks and 6 months".

Low serotonin levels

Contrary to the initial hypothesis that this phenomenon was due to the effects of intermittent fasting on the reproductive organs, the authors showed how this greater libido would actually be linked to the deficiency induced by the tryptophan diet, an essential amino acid (i.e. neither mice nor human beings can summarize it alone, but that it must be taken through food). Triptofano is responsible for production in the brain of serotonin, neurotransmitter generally associated with inhibitory effects, which was present in male mice at unusually low levels. "The mice were, so to speak, sexually uninhibited," commented Ehninger. "The lack of serotonin was clearly the result of fasting." At the moment, however, "it is not clear whether the reduction of serotonin levels is connected to our specific diet or would also occur with other types of fasting", added Zhou, suggesting that the effect could also occur in a diet where food is always available, but in reduced quantities.

Is the same for us?

We also know that chemical messengers play an important role in regulating sexual behavior also in human beings. "This applies in particular for serotonin," explained Ehninger. "I consider it very plausible that sexual desire in humans can be influenced by fasting, perhaps not only in men, but also in women, since serotonin also affects their libido", concluded the expert, according to which, although they serve further research, intermittent fasting could potentially be added to the treatments already available to treat the unwanted drop in libido.

Title: SoftBank G invests up to USD 40 billion in OpenAI - expected to complete by December
Description:
On April 1, SoftBank Group (SBG) announced that it had finally agreed to an additional investment of up to 40 billion US dollars (5.9808 trillion yen) in OpenAI Global, an artificial intelligence research and development company under OpenAI, on March 31, 2018.

Of the investments up to 40 billion US dollars, 10 billion US dollars will be syndicated with external investors, so SoftBank Group's actual investments are up to 30 billion US dollars (4.4856 trillion yen), with 10 billion US dollars expected to be completed in mid-April 2025 and the maximum US dollars of 30 billion US dollars in December 2025. Additionally, SBG's traditional financial policy regarding LTV (Loan to Value: calculated based on adjusted net interest-bearing debt ÷ shareholding value) and liquidity on hand remain unchanged.

SBG has invested a total of USD 2.2 billion in OpenAI from SoftBank Vision Fund 2 since September 2024. On January 21, 2025, together with OpenAI, they announced the "Stargate Project," which will build AI infrastructure in the United States.

The additional investment will be to support OpenAI's further growth in line with the Stargate project, and to incorporate the fruits of that growth into SBG's NAV (Net Asset Value: Stockholding - calculated as adjusted net interest-bearing debt).

Title: What time will Nintendo announce the Switch 2? The key points to be noted
Description:
The Nintendo Switch 2 announcement, scheduled for April 2nd, could be the biggest news in the gaming space of 2025. Nintendo, which surprised people by releasing a preview for Switch 2 in January, is expected to release more detailed information, including the price of Switch 2, the games to be released, and the release date.

The company has not yet revealed details about the Switch 2 since January. What we know is that it will adopt the new "Joy-Con" and also play games from the original Switch. Additionally, the console is larger than the original Switch, and it is expected to improve graphics performance. The mysterious "C" button is also a big question. More information will be revealed on the 2nd.

Here's what we know about Nintendo's video streaming "Nintendo Direct," which is scheduled to be announced for Switch 2:

What time will Nintendo Direct start?

According to Nintendo, Nintendo Direct will be streaming on Wednesday, April 2nd from 10pm.

Where can I watch it?

Just like previous Nintendo Direct, it will be streamed on Nintendo's YouTube channel and Twitch channel.

What will be announced?

The biggest announcement is the release date and price of the Switch 2. The Switch 2 trial session will continue until June 1st, so it is likely that it will be released in June. According to a recent leak, US retailers will begin accepting reservations for Switch 2 on April 9th.

As for the price, it could be the same as the original Switch (32,978 yen including tax in Japan), but you shouldn't expect too much. The OLED model Switch costs $350 (37,980 yen), and considering that it has already been around eight years since the first Switch was released, it's no surprise that the Switch 2 will be released for $400.

The next thing to notice is the game. So far, Nintendo has only revealed a new Mario Kart game in its Switch 2 trailer. When the company releases new consoles, it often offers titles from the big-scale series, so it is possible that other Mario series and new works from "Zelda" will appear at the time of release or immediately after that. The 2025 titles are also expected to include "Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition," "Pokemon LEGENDS Z-A," and "Metroid Prime 4 Beyond."

It's also worth noting how much third-party support will be. The original Switch had fewer third-party games than the Xbox and PlayStation due to lack of hardware performance, but if the Switch 2 specs were enhanced like Steam Deck, it could increase significantly.

Technical specifications will also be featured heavily in Nintendo Direct. Those considering purchasing are interested in how much graphics performance will improve on the Switch 2 and how long the battery lasts.

The new Joy-Con is also a concern. The released footage shows it moving like a PC mouse, which seems to be an interesting use in some PC games.

The only major feature that Nintendo has officially revealed at this point is that it can also play games from the original Switch. However, there seem to be some exceptions.

Title: Apple's "AI Doctor" will be released in 2026
Description:
Apple is expected to bolster its "healthcare" apps with AI doctors, or health coaches that incorporate them into its mobile devices.

According to Mark Gurman of Bloomberg, the initiative is known as "Project Mulberry," and could be released as early as 2026 in a future version of iOS. It provides advice on eating habits and exercise methods, and is said to utilize data collected from iPhones and Apple Watches.

It is already known that Apple CEO Tim Cook is aiming to strengthen its healthcare-related technology.

Apple did not immediately respond to requests for comment.

It is not clear whether the company's efforts will become a medical resource with diagnostic capabilities, as Bloomberg reports suggests, or it will be positioned as a virtual advisor to health and wellness. According to Bloomberg, the AI ​​agent is trained with data from real physicians and could include content from doctors and health experts.

As Mayo Clinic reports, combining AI with healthcare has great potential, especially in terms of preventive medicine and risk assessment, but risks have also been pointed out.

In December 2024, ECRI, a non-profit medical research organization, published a report cited AI as the biggest risk factor for healthcare in 2025. The report acknowledges that AI could change healthcare for the better, but warns that inaccurate or misleading AI responses and AI products that do not work as expected can be potentially dangerous to the healthcare industry.

Title: World introduces Toshiba Tech's RFID solution at approximately 1,100 stores
Description:
World has introduced an inventory solution that utilizes RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) technology at its apparel stores. The provider, Toshiba Tech, announced it on March 31st.

Toshiba Tech will attach RFID tags to all products sold in stores, and use the RFID system "RFLogispert" and the RFID hand reader "UF-3000" to speed up inventory and search for specific products.

The solution began to be implemented in February, and is currently operating at approximately 1,100 of World's stores. Toshiba Tech aims to improve the efficiency of logistics warehouse operations by providing warehouse inbound and shipping solutions using RFID technology to the world.

Title: A genuine review of Xiaomi's "POCO F7 Ultra" with Snadra 8 Elite for less than 100,000 yen.
Description:
筆者がディナーパーティで写真を撮ろうとしていると、友人が「またそのスポンジ・ボブみたいなスマホを持ってきたの？」と話しかけてきた。私はそれに、「どちらかと言えばミニオンっぽいと思ってるんだけど、その例えもなかなかいいね」と笑顔で応じた。

友人が話題にしたのは、小米科技（シャオミ）のサブブランドであるPOCOが最近発売した、鮮やかなイエローのミッドレンジスマートフォン「POCO F7 Ultra」のことだ。POCO F7 Ultraは、最小構成の価格が649ドル（日本では税込9万9800円）のモデルだが、その中身は見た目以上に尖っている。プロセッサーはQualcommの「Snapdragon 8 Elite」、バッテリー容量も5300mAhと大容量で、さらにInstagramへの投稿にも使える高品質な写真が撮れるトリプルリアカメラシステムを備えている。

そのスペックは、それだけでも十分に特筆に値するものだ。特にSnapdragon 8 Eliteを搭載しているという点では、サムスンの「Galaxy S25」シリーズや「OnePlus 13」、「Xiaomi 15 Ultra」などのハイエンドモデルと肩を並べている。では、F7 Ultraの性能はそれらのお高いモデルに匹敵するものなのだろうか。それとも、その安さには大いなる妥協が伴うのだろうか。

筆者は、実際にF7 Ultraを2週間ほど使って、その使い勝手を確かめてみた。その間、友人や花の写真を撮ったり、テレビ番組をストリーミングしたりしただけでなく、逆ワイヤレス充電機能で外出中にiPhoneの充電に使ったりもした（この見た目が印象的なスマートフォンは、この機能のおかげで頼れる相棒になってくれた）。

POCO F7 Ultra本体とディスプレイ

全体として言えば、POCO F7 Ultraは丸い角とフレームギリギリまで広がるディスプレイを持つ、なめらかな仕上げの洗練されたスマートフォンだ。そのサイズは「iPhone 16 Pro Max」と同じくらい（それよりはやや小さいが）で、筆者の手の大きさにぴったりだった。

画面はサイズが6.67インチで120MHzのAMOLEDディスプレイで、ピーク輝度は3200ニトとなっている。この数字は、iPhone 16シリーズの2000ニトやGalaxy S25の2600ニトは上回っているが、OnePlus 13の4500ニトには及ばない。屋内ではPOCOとサムスンのディスプレイは同じくらい鮮明に見えるが、明るい日差しの下ではF7 Ultraの明るさが際立つ。また、POCO F7 Ultraのディスプレイは、他社のフラッグシップモデルと同じように常時点灯しているため、いつでも時刻や通知を盗み見ることができる。

筆者が特に嬉しく感じたのは、F7 Ultraのベゼルが細く、ストリーミングやソーシャルメディアを楽しむ時の没入感が高いことだ。動画の色彩はiPhoneやGalaxyシリーズよりも抑えめになっており、そこに映る物体や人物の顔はやや色温度が高く、鮮やかさに欠ける。しかし、映像のシャープさに不足はない。

重量は212gと若干重めだが、それがかえって、しっかりと作られたプレミアムなデバイスだと感じさせる要因になっている（F7 Ultraの重量はOnePlus 13とほぼ同じで、Galaxy S25 Ultra、iPhone 16 Pro Maxよりも軽い）。ガラス製の背面カバーと金属の側面フレームは、高級感のあるマットな仕上げになっており、滑りにくい。アルミ製のリングで囲まれたカメラモジュールは背面から出っ張っているが、邪魔に感じるほどではなく、ケースを付けずに机の上に置いてもそれほどがたつかない。

また同社によれば、デバイスの前面は強固な画面保護ガラスである「POCO Shield Glass」で覆われている。実際にディスプレイをタップしたり押したりした際にも、頑丈さが感じられた。幸いなことに、これまでのところ、デバイスを落としてしまった場合にこの保護ガラスがどうなるかをテストする機会はなかった。少なくとも、このデバイスをケースや画面保護フィルムを付けずに何日もバックパックに放り込んで使っていても、傷一つ付かなかった。POCO F7 UltraはIP68等級の防塵・防水性能を備えているが、幸運にも、まだその性能を試すような事態には遭遇していない。

POCO F7 Ultraのカラーバリエーションには、イエロー以外に、もっと落ち着いたブラックも存在する。筆者が個人的に選ぶとすればブラックだが、大胆なデザインが好きで、イエローの方が好みだという人もいるだろう。

POCO F7 Ultraの性能とバッテリー

POCO F7 Ultraの最大の特徴はSnapdragon 8 Eliteを搭載していることであり、その価格に期待される水準を大幅に上回る、目覚ましい性能を発揮する。このプロセッサーは、F7 Ultraよりもずっと高価なGalaxy S25シリーズやOnePlus 13、「Oppo Find N5」などにも採用されており、それらのモデルの性能を大きく引き上げた。

F7 Ultraでアプリをスワイプして切り替えるときの感触は快適かつスムーズだ。ディスプレイに内蔵されている超音波指紋センサーを使ったロック解除も速やかで、ラグはまったく感じないし、カメラもほぼ瞬時に起動できる。ただし、動画をストリーミングする際や、横方向から縦方向、あるいはその逆に画面の向きを切り替える際には若干のラグが生じるし、YouTubeやNetflixをスワイプしてピクチャー・イン・ピクチャーモードに切り替えたりするのにも若干時間がかかる。それを除けば、マルチタスクはスムーズに行える。

GPUとマルチコアCPUのベンチマークテストである「Geekbench 6」では、POCO F7 Ultraは「Galaxy S24 Ultra」や「POCO X6 Pro」よりも上だ。「3DMark Wild Life Extreme」を使ったグラフィックスのテストでも、iPhone 15 Pro、Galaxy S24 Ultra、「Xiaomi 14」を上回った。詳しいデータについては以下のグラフを見てほしい。

F7 Ultraのもう1つの大きな特徴は、5300mAhのバッテリーを積んでおり、120Wの超高速充電と50Wのワイヤレス充電に対応していることだ。これだけ容量があれば、1回の充電で1日中使ってもおつりが来る。また、ワイヤレス逆充電（ワイヤレス充電対応のデバイスをPOCO F7 Ultraから充電できる機能）は非常にありがたい機能で、筆者の場合、外出先で他のスマートフォンを充電する必要ができた時に（移動が多い記者にはよく起きる問題だ）助けられた。

ストリーミング、ソーシャルメディアの閲覧、ビデオ通話への参加、ゲームなどを組み合わせた45分間の耐久テストでは、バッテリーが満充電から97％まで低下した。これは「OnePlus 13R」と同じ成績で、2025年に入ってから最高の結果だ。YouTubeの動画を全画面モードで、最大輝度にしてWi-Fi経由で再生する3時間のストリーミングテストでは、バッテリーは100％から87％に低下した。また充電テストでは、なんと30分間で0％から90％まで充電でき、満充電までにかかった時間はわずか35分強だった。

POCO F7 UltraにはAndroid 15が搭載されており、RAMが12GB、内蔵ストレージが256GBのモデルが649ドル（日本では9万9980円）、RAMが16GB、ストレージが512GBのモデルが699ドル（同10万9800円）となっている。

POCO F7 Ultraのカメラ

続いて、スマートフォンを購入する人の多くが重視しているカメラに話を移そう。POCO F7 Ultraには、5000万画素のメインカメラ、5000万画素の2.5倍望遠カメラ、3200万画素の超広角カメラ、そして3200万画素の前面カメラが搭載されている。

一般に、F7 Ultraの写真は色が柔らかで、色調は抑えめになる。友人のDanaをポートレートモードで撮った以下の写真がその好例だ。全体的にベージュがかった色調が彼女の衣装を引き立て、写真全体に落ち着いた印象を与えている。筆者は、前面の友人が非常に鮮明に写っており、背景に穏やかなボケ効果が入っているところが気に入っている。

自撮り写真も同じように色調はソフトで落ち着いた感じになるが、その代わり肌が美しく滑らかに見える。それはポートレートモードで撮った自撮り写真についても同じで、こちらもしっかり被写体にピントが合っている。

筆者はもう少し色彩が鮮やかな写真が好みなのだが、特に屋外では、F7 Ultraのカメラでもそのような写真が撮れる場合がある。小鳥用の水盤を写した以下の写真では、石材の色や、花びらの明るいピンクや、背景の鮮やかな緑が織り成す幅広い色相が、よりパンチの効いた色合いで表現されている。白い花の花びらは少しぼやけて境界が分かりにくくなってしまっているが、それ以外の部分は、石もレンガもくっきりと写っていることが分かるだろう。

F7 Ultraの5倍ズームでは、シャープネスと鮮明さがしっかりと保たれている。次のチューリップの画像を見てもらえば、花びら一枚一枚に入っている細い線などの細かい部分まではっきり写っていることが見て取れるはずだ。この写真の色彩は特に鮮やかだが、その代償として背景の陰影も強くなってしまっている。ユーザーは、そうした欠点も含めて、どちらの色調がいいかを自分で選択するしかない。

F7 Ultraのカメラが苦手とする場面もある。例えば、昼下がりに強い日差しの中で撮影した次の写真は、かなり白飛びしてしまっている。ただし幸いなことに、これは例外的なケースだった。

筆者が特に感心したのは夜の写真だ。このトルコランプの写真は、真っ暗闇に近い中で撮影したものだが、鮮明でクリアに写っており、模様の色の違いも判別できる。

AIで写真から不要なもの削除する機能を使えば、タップ2回で邪魔なものを消すことができるのだが、この機能は完璧ではない（これは、他社の同様の機能にも言えることだ）。何かを消す処理に数秒間かかるだけでなく、以下の写真で「人間を消す」オプションを選んだケースでは、人間が立っていた部分がぼやけた感じになった。トートバッグの残骸も残っており、筆者は再度これを手動で消す必要があった。

総じて言えば、これらの写真のほとんどはソーシャルメディアへの投稿に相応しいものだった。これは、筆者としてはかなり高い評価のつもりだ。

POCO F7 Ultraはどんな人向け？

POCO F7 Ultraは、価格の割には機能が充実したスマートフォンで、処理性能が非常に高く、充電速度も驚異的で、総合的なプレミアム感も備えている。これらの特徴は、同価格帯の「Galaxy S24 FE」やOnePlus 13Rなどとは一線を画すものだ。ディスプレイのシャープさや、一般的なラグや、一部のカメラ機能に多少の弱点があるが、長所が短所を大きく上回っている（重量に関してはもう少し軽ければよいとは思うが、購入をためらうほどの問題ではない）。

大金を払うことはできないが、処理能力、バッテリー容量、カメラが優れているスマートフォンを探しているという人なら、POCO F7 Ultraは魅力的な選択肢に感じられるだろう。

「POCO F7 Ultra」（価格をAmazonでチェック）

Title: "Apple Intelligence" in 5 minutes -- How will your iPhone or Mac evolve (summary)
Description:
Apple's AI function, Apple Intelligence, has finally been compatible with Japanese. The essay tool allows you to rewrite, proofread, and summarise text, the cleanup function removes unnecessary items from images, and creates your own original image with Image Playground. Furthermore, the integration of ChatGPT has made Siri much smarter.

Apple Intelligence can be used on devices compatible with iOS 18.4, iPadOS 18.4, and macOS Sequoia 15.4 (15 Pro or later on iPhone, and M1 or later on Mac).

The writing tool that helps you write works on iOS, iPadOS, and macOS in general, and can be used in a wide range of apps from emails, messages, memos, and other companies. "Rewrite" allows you to adjust the textual expression, while "proofreading" allows you to check the grammar and structure. The Summary feature allows you to shorten or list selected text.

The Photos app now has natural language search, allowing you to search for photos and videos using specified keywords. Cleanup (Google's Eraser Magic function) will erase unnecessary objects and automatically generate movies from the descriptions entered using the memory function.

Image Playground, an image generation tool, allows you to easily generate images in three styles: animation, illustration, and sketch. Furthermore, "Gen Characters" allows you to use the generated AI to generate emojis that suit your taste.

The Memo App has introduced the "Image Magic Wand" to allow you to generate related images based on the text written on memos and the handwritten content. This allows for a more visual understanding of the context described in the memo.

The email app will prepare a "priority message" and display highly important emails at the top of your inbox. Additionally, smart reply allows you to instantly suggest answers to your questions, and notification summary function allows you to organize large numbers of notifications.

The phone and memo apps transcriptions of calls and voices are performed, and the contents are automatically summarized when the call ends.

Siri has also been upgraded significantly. The AI-generated platform enables natural dialogue and allows for smooth switching between voice and text input.

A "visual intelligence" function has also been implemented, in which AI explains the objects captured on the camera. When you show the object you want to know with a camera and ask, "What is this?", they will answer. It also teaches foreign language menus, making it convenient for traveling abroad. The iPhone 16 and 16 Pro can be launched by holding down the camera controls, while the iPhone 15 Pro can be launched by customizing the action buttons, etc.

Apple Intelligence places emphasis on processing on devices, and executes many generated AI models on devices. If a larger model is needed, private cloud computing will be used to protect privacy and utilize the cloud's computing power.

Title: Why is "an external thermal camera that can be attached to Android" a must-have for everyday use? -- Explaining the use [Review]
Description:
I love Android smartphones with built-in thermal (thermo) cameras, such as the Ulefone Power Armor 18. However, buying a new smartphone just for thermal cameras is a huge burden.

That's where I found the best product. It's the InfiRay P2 Pro, which can be externally attached to the USB-C port of an Android smartphone.

The price is around $250 (39,000 yen including tax in Japan), but it's well worth the purchase. If you take a picture of the device when it is operating normally with a thermal camera, you can understand the "normal state", which makes it easier to spot the defective location in the event of an abnormality.

●What is InfiRay P2 Pro?

The InfiRay P2 Pro is a product that comes with an ultra-compact thermal camera and a magnetic macro lens. It measures 27 x 18 x 9.8 mm and weighs only 9 g.

InfiRay P2 Pro (check price on Amazon)



The installation method is extremely simple, just plug it directly into the USB-C terminal on your smartphone. However, if you have a thick case attached or a smartphone with a highly durable and thick housing, the terminal may not reach. In that case, use a USB-C extension adapter to make sure there is no problem. All you have to do is freely scan the surroundings with a thermographic scan.

Once it's on, all you have to do is look at your smartphone screen.

What I particularly liked was that not only crosshairs are displayed in the center of the app screen, but markers are automatically displayed in the "hottest part" and "hottest part."

Furthermore, the included macro lens is convenient, allowing you to take photos from quite a close distance just by clicking on it, allowing you to clearly check the temperature difference in small areas.

While software has a lot of customization items, it is not difficult to handle because it has too many features. The advantage is that it is well balanced.

●Many uses in everyday life

I've reviewed a variety of maniacal gadgets, but it's rare to find a thermal camera that's as good as this price range. For those who don't know what to use, here are some examples of use.

- Abnormal heat generation in the electrical system (components that are about to break down are more likely to have heat than normal)

- Discovering problems related to air conditioning (HVAC) such as heat leaks in windows and impaired heating and cooling

- Discovering an overheated rechargeable battery

・ Understanding the location of under-floor pipes (radiator pipes, etc.)

・Check abnormal heat generation in the power cable

・Discover cooling problems with desktop PCs and laptops

Check if the brakes of the car are dragging

The trick to using it in everyday life is to check the condition of the device properly with a thermal camera in advance. If you know which parts generate how much heat, you will be able to notice any abnormalities immediately when a malfunction occurs.

In fact, I use thermal cameras frequently. I just wanted to check if a certain electrical device was connected to a power source. Normally, a multimeter would be used, but I was able to check that the internal parts were warmed with the camera and find out whether the power supply circuit was operating properly, which was helpful.

●Overall review

I have tried many thermal cameras, including standalone and smartphone-connected models, but the InfiRay P2 Pro is my favorite product. It is compact and easy to handle, and the macro lens further expands the range of applications. It also operates quickly and is highly accurate. Additionally, the big advantage is that it does not require a battery.

●Main specifications of InfiRay P2 Pro>

・Infrared resolution: 256 x 192

・Temperature measurement range: -20°C to 550°C (error: ±2°C)

- Ultra-compact design: 27 x 18 x 9.8 mm, weight: 9 g

・No battery required

・Compatible with Android 9.0 or later ・Equipped with USB-C interface

Title: KDDI releases "RCS" to iPhone users -- Can send and receive large files with phone numbers
Description:
On April 1st, KDDI began offering "RCS" (Rich Communication Services) to iPhone users.

RCS is, so to speak, an enhanced version of SMS. You can exchange large-capacity content such as photos and videos using just your phone number.

To use it, you will need to update to iOS 18.4, turn on the RCS switch and apply for the RCS option.

RCS is a globally standardized messaging service by GSMA, an industry association for mobile communications operators, and can also send and receive large files between Android and iPhone.

Meanwhile, carriers are required to use it on iPhones, and KDDI is the first domestic carrier to start offering RCS on iPhones. However, if other carriers do not respond, it will not become a general messaging service, so trends in other carriers are also being watched.

Matsuda Hiroji, CEO and CEO of KDDI, commented, "KDDI supports efforts to expand the spread of RCS and will further promote the appeal of messaging services. GSMA is working with domestic and international partners to promote standardized RCS specifications globally."

Title: OpenAI releases new "openweight language model" -- in the coming months
Description:
OpenAI, the creator of the popular interactive AI "ChatGPT," is building a new AI model. The model will become an "openweight" language model with inference capabilities, CEO Sam Altman revealed on social media X. It is expected to be released in the next few months.

Openweight AI models seem to be somewhere between open source and closed source. The weights, which are coefficients of AI models, are published, so they can be modified without retraining using new data.

These models are often relatively inexpensive and are available to companies, providing a high degree of freedom in customization. For example, if a company uploads its internal documents to an existing open weight model, the information can be reflected in the results without having to recreate the entire model from scratch.

However, the open weight model and the "open source" model are not the same. As the name suggests, open source models also reveal the source code, as well as how the models are learned and how their weights are set. On the other hand, although the weights of the open weight model are public, source code and training data are not normally public. Considering that OpenAI has not previously published the data used to learn ChatGPT, it is likely that even this new open weight model will only contain some of the information published.

OpenAI is looking for developer feedback to make the new open-weight model maximally useful. Interested people can apply to participate in a feedback session using the form on the OpenAI website.
